forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. South southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In the cool hush of morning, Downtown San Francisco greets the day under a gentle shroud of partly cloudy skies, the temperature settling comfortably near 54 degrees. The day ahead promises sunshine, brightening to a high of around 70, then softly drawing back to the 68 mark as the afternoon unfolds. A South Southwest breeze wafts through the streets, teasing a sense of lightness, hinting at higher gusts that may rustle the leaves as the sun intensifies.

The marine layer may cloak the edges of the city, a fleeting reminder of the coastal embrace that often lingers in these early hours. As clarity emerges, one can anticipate that typical San Franciscan haze dissipating, revealing vibrant views across the bay. In these conditions, it feels prudent to dress in layers—a light sweater or jacket to accompany the inevitable morning chill, gently peeled away as the sun extends its warmth. The day invites you to explore the charming nooks and crannies of the city, perhaps to stroll through the colorful alleys adorned with murals or stop by a quaint café, sharing moments over a steaming cup of coffee. In this subtle interplay of sun and wind, there lies a perfect canvas for the discovery of simple yet enriching pleasures.
